title: Abhi Saikia, Pinky Medhi, Minimi - Gamkharu Thuriya (Visualizer)
description:
Bihu is the heart of Assamese culture, and we’re excited to share our special Bihu song with a unique twist! This is our heartfelt Bihu gift to all of you. Wishing everyone a blessed and joyful Bihu! Let the celebrations begin! 

Credits

Music Production & Composition: Abhi Saikia
Lyrics: Somiran Malay, Minimi (Rap)
Singers: Pinky Medhi & Minimi
Guitar: AKUL
Mixing, Mastering & Additional Product

title: Bohagi - TRIV × KLANZ × DXA (feat. Diptanil Barua) | ABIKALPA | Pankaj Pao | Assamese EDM 2021
description:
Bohagi - TRIV × KLANZ × DXA (feat. Diptanil Barua) | ABIKALPA | Pankaj Pao | Assamese EDM 2021

BOHAGI, a song by TRIV, KLANZ, DXA, and Diptanil Barua, is a part of the historic album ABIKALPA, which is the first ever full scale Assamese Electronic Album in history.

Be sure to stream the track on Spotify too :

https://open.spotify.com/track/3bKQf2KD2JxEG6gE065WSu?si=Gg2Bf-WbSKy5qcskpIAGcg&utm_so

title: Coke Studio Bharat | HOLO LOLO | Shankuraj Konwar X Shalmali Kholgade
description: Across cultures, resilience and wisdom are often passed down through generations, shaping how we navigate adulthood. Inspired by the famed Moran community, #HoloLolo is a soulful track performed by Assam local #shankurajkonwar, as he tells the story of the challenges of navigating adulthood along with #shalmalikholgade, who brings her unique perspective. title: Roi Roi Roti - The Spirit of Bihu | Abhishruti Bezbaruah | Assamese Bihu Song | Official HD Video
description: Abhishruti's "Roi Roi Roti - The Spirit of Bihu" - a folk fusion bihu song conceptualized using typical local live ambient sounds and ethnic instruments which are heard and associated with the spring season, a very important season for us , Assamese , it being the New year - Rongali Bihu. Making live sounds the bed of the song, we have fused  ethnic instruments with electronic elements to give it
